languages.text: {n}Мостик вздрагивает от прокатывающегося по нему сокрушительного рева. За фасадом обманного лица вы на мгновение прозреваете Чудовищную Тень. Тень в пустоте, желающую пожрать вас.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
конец диалога
идем в катсцену стрелять в тварь

конец диалога
идем в катсцену стрелять в тварь

languages.text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мостик вздрагивает от прокатывающегося по нему сокрушительного рева. За фасадом обманного лица вы на мгновение прозреваете Чудовищную Тень. Тень в пустоте, желающую пожрать вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar rolls across it. Behind the facade of the deceiving face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow. A shadow in the void that wants to devour you.{/n}
{n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar rolls across it. Behind the facade of the deceiving face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow. A shadow in the void that wants to devour you.{/n}
{n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}
{n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}
{n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}
{n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El puente se estremece cuando un rugido atronador lo recorre. Ves que tras ese rostro malicioso se oculta una sombra monstruosa, una sombra del vacío que solo ansía devorarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El puente se estremece cuando un rugido atronador lo recorre. Ves que tras ese rostro malicioso se oculta una sombra monstruosa, una sombra del vacío que solo ansía devorarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}大きな衝撃音の波が端から端まで響いて、ブリッジが揺れた。その卑劣な顔の正面の向こうに、怪物の影がちらりと見える。こちらを貪り食うことだけを望む虚空の影だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}大きな衝撃音の波が端から端まで響いて、ブリッジが揺れた。その卑劣な顔の正面の向こうに、怪物の影がちらりと見える。こちらを貪り食うことだけを望む虚空の影だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}充满压迫感的巨响汹涌而来，整个舰桥都在颤抖。在那张嗤笑的脸后面，你看到了那个恐怖的影子——那个渴望将你吞噬殆尽的虚空之影。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}充满压迫感的巨响汹涌而来，整个舰桥都在颤抖。在那张嗤笑的脸后面，你看到了那个恐怖的影子——那个渴望将你吞噬殆尽的虚空之影。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Brücke bebt, als ein donnerndes Brüllen über sie hinwegfegt. Hinter der Fassade dieses grinsendes Gesichts erblickst du den monströsen Schatten. Den Schatten in der Leere, der nur eines will: dich verschlingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Brücke bebt, als ein donnerndes Brüllen über sie hinwegfegt. Hinter der Fassade dieses grinsendes Gesichts erblickst du den monströsen Schatten. Den Schatten in der Leere, der nur eines will: dich verschlingen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La passerelle tremble sous l'effet d'un grondement écrasant. Derrière le masque de ce visage insidieux, vous apercevez une ombre monstrueuse, celle qui, depuis le vide, s'est donné pour seul et unique objectif de vous dévorer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La passerelle tremble sous l'effet d'un grondement écrasant. Derrière le masque de ce visage insidieux, vous apercevez une ombre monstrueuse, celle qui, depuis le vide, s'est donné pour seul et unique objectif de vous dévorer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Köprü, ezici bir kükreme dalgasıyla titriyor. O gözlerini dikmiş suretin arkasındaki devasa gölgeyi seçebiliyorsun. Uçsuzdaki, tek istediği seni tüketmek olan gölgeyi...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge shudders as a crushing roar billows across it. Behind the facade of that leering face, you glimpse the monstrous shadow — the shadow in the void that wants only to devour you.{/n}
